verses.verse: O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou art my <S%H430>God<s%>; I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> <S%H3034>thee<s%>, I will praise thy <S%H8034>name<s%>; for thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6382>wonderful<s%> <S%H6098>things<s%>, even counsels of <S%H7350>old<s%>, in <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and <S%H544>truth<s%>.

For thou hast <S%H7760>made<s%> of a <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H1530>heap<s%>, of a <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%> a <S%H4654>ruin<s%>, a <S%H759>palace<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers<s%> to be no <S%H5892>city<s%>; it shall <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H1129>built<s%>.
Therefore shall a <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3513>glorify<s%> <S%H7151>thee<s%>; a city of <S%H6184>terrible<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall fear <S%H3372>thee<s%>.

For thou hast been a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> to the <S%H1800>poor<s%>, a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> to the <S%H34>needy<s%> in his <S%H6862>distress<s%>, a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> from the <S%H2230>storm<s%>, a <S%H6738>shade<s%> from the <S%H2721>heat<s%>, when the <S%H7307>blast<s%> of the terrible <S%H6184>ones<s%> is as a <S%H2230>storm<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall<s%>.

As the <S%H2721>heat<s%> in a dry <S%H6724>place<s%> wilt thou bring <S%H3665>down<s%> the <S%H7588>noise<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers<s%>; as the <S%H2721>heat<s%> by the <S%H6738>shade<s%> of a <S%H5645>cloud<s%>, the <S%H2159>song<s%> of the terrible <S%H6184>ones<s%> shall be brought <S%H6030>low<s%>.

And in this <S%H2022>mountain<s%> will <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> unto all <S%H5971>peoples<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> of fat <S%H8081>things<s%>, a <S%H4960>feast<s%> of wines on the <S%H8105>lees<s%>, of fat <S%H8081>things<s%> full of <S%H4229>marrow<s%>, of wines on the <S%H8105>lees<s%> well <S%H2212>refined<s%>.

And he will <S%H1104>destroy<s%> in this <S%H2022>mountain<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3875>covering<s%> that <S%H3874>covereth<s%> all <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, and the <S%H4541>veil<s%> that is <S%H5259>spread<s%> over all <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

He hath swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%>; and the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%> will wipe <S%H4229>away<s%> <S%H1832>tears<s%> from off all <S%H6440>faces<s%>; and the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%> will he take <S%H5493>away<s%> from off all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.

And it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H430>Lo<s%>, this is our God; we have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for <S%H3467>him<s%>, and he will save <S%H3068>us<s%>: this is Jehovah; we have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for <S%H1523>him<s%>, we will be glad and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.

For in this <S%H2022>mountain<s%> will the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5117>rest<s%>; and <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be trodden <S%H1758>down<s%> in his <S%H4963>place<s%>, even as straw is trodden <S%H1758>down<s%> in the water of the <S%H4087>dunghill<s%>.

And he shall spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> <S%H7811>thereof<s%>, as he that swimmeth spreadeth <S%H6566>forth<s%> his hands to <S%H7811>swim<s%>; but Jehovah will lay <S%H8213>low<s%> his <S%H1346>pride<s%> together with the <S%H698>craft<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And the <S%H4869>high<s%> <S%H4013>fortress<s%> of thy <S%H2346>walls<s%> hath he brought <S%H7817>down<s%>, laid <S%H8213>low<s%>, and <S%H5060>brought<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, even to the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
